EmailTemplate.description: When customer don't know that they have access to the database
EmailTemplate.name: EGPWS - How to access Data
EmailTemplate.subject: Access to the Terrain Database tool {!Account.Name} {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
We have checked your account profile and you have access to the EGPWS tool.
Your Honeywell ID is: __________________
To access the EGPWS data please do the following: • Log in to https://ads.honeywell.com/ • Click on My Downloads (click on the "Go to my downloads blue tab") • Two blue tabs will show in the next screen- Navdb & EGPWS • EGPWS documentation will be available when clicking the EGPWS tab. Please reply to this email if you require any additional assistance.
Regards,
Terrain Database Services Account Management Representative(AMR) Email: dsa@honeywell.com
